H0.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Butterfly

H1.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Ant

H2.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Wasp

H3.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Bee

A4.text: Human beekeeping or apiculture (meliponiculture for stingless bees) has been practiced as a discipline of animal husbandry for millennia, since at least the times of Ancient Egypt and Ancient Greece.

A5.text: From the 18th century, European understanding of the colonies and biology of bees allowed the construction of the moveable comb hive so that honey could be harvested without destroying the colony.
